parameters.description: Return only enabled trigger prototypes that belong to monitored hosts.
parameters.name: active

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes that belong to the given LLD rules.
parameters.name: discoveryids

parameters.description:
Return only triggers that use the given functions.

Refer to the Supported functions page for a list of supported functions.
parameters.name: functions

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes that belong to hosts or templates from the host groups or template groups with the given name.
parameters.name: group

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes that belong to hosts or templates from the given host groups or template groups.
parameters.name: groupids

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes that belong to hosts with the given name.
parameters.name: host

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes that belong to the given hosts.
parameters.name: hostids

parameters.description: If set to true return only trigger prototypes inherited from a template.
parameters.name: inherited

parameters.description: If set to true return only enabled trigger prototypes that belong to hosts in maintenance.
parameters.name: maintenance

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes with severity greater or equal than the given severity.
parameters.name: min_severity

parameters.description: Return only enabled trigger prototypes that belong to monitored hosts and contain only enabled items.
parameters.name: monitored

parameters.description: If set to true return only trigger prototypes that belong to templates.
parameters.name: templated

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes that belong to the given templates.
parameters.name: templateids

parameters.description: Return only trigger prototypes with the given IDs.
parameters.name: triggerids

parameters.description: Expand functions and macros in the trigger expression.
parameters.name: expandExpression

parameters.description: Return trigger prototypes and triggers that the trigger prototype depends on in the dependencies property.
parameters.name: selectDependencies

parameters.description: Return the LLD rule that the trigger prototype belongs to in the discoveryRule property.
parameters.name: selectDiscoveryRule

parameters.description:
Return functions used in the trigger prototype in the functions property.

The function objects represent the functions used in the trigger expression and has the following properties:
functionid - (ID) ID of the function;
itemid - (ID) ID of the item used in the function;
function - (string) name of the function;
parameter - (string) parameter passed to the function. Query parameter is replaced by $ symbol in returned string.
parameters.name: selectFunctions

parameters.description: Return the host groups that the trigger prototype belongs to in the hostgroups property.
parameters.name: selectHostGroups

parameters.description: Return the hosts that the trigger prototype belongs to in the hosts property.
parameters.name: selectHosts

parameters.description: Return items and item prototypes used the trigger prototype in the items property.
parameters.name: selectItems

parameters.description: Return the trigger prototype tags in tags property.
parameters.name: selectTags

parameters.description: Return the template groups that the trigger prototype belongs to in the templategroups property.
parameters.name: selectTemplateGroups

parameters.description:
Return only those results that exactly match the given filter.

Accepts an object, where the keys are property names, and the values are either a single value or an array of values to match against.

Does not support properties of text data type.

Supports additional properties:
host - technical name of the host that the trigger prototype belongs to;
hostid - ID of the host that the trigger prototype belongs to.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description:
Limits the number of records returned by subselects.

Applies to the following subselects:
selectHosts - results will be sorted by host.
parameters.name: limitSelects

parameters.description:
Sort the result by the given properties.

Possible values: triggerid, description, status, priority.
parameters.name: sortfield

parameters.description: rowspan="11">These parameters being common for all get methods are described in detail in the reference commentary.
parameters.name: countOutput

parameters.description:
This parameter is deprecated, please use selectHostGroups or selectTemplateGroups instead.
Return the host groups and template groups that the trigger prototype belongs to in the groups property.
parameters.name:
selectGroups
(deprecated)

parameters.description: Return the number of records in the result instead of the actual data.
parameters.name: countOutput

parameters.description: If set to true return only objects that the user has write permissions to.  Default: false.
parameters.name: editable

parameters.description: Return results that do not match the criteria given in the search parameter.
parameters.name: excludeSearch

parameters.description: Return only those results that exactly match the given filter. Accepts an array, where the keys are property names, and the values are either a single value or an array of values to match against. Doesn't work for text fields.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Limit the number of records returned.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Object properties to be returned. Default: extend.
parameters.name: output

parameters.description: Use IDs as keys in the resulting array.
parameters.name: preservekeys

parameters.description: Return results that match the given wildcard search (case-insensitive). Accepts an array, where the keys are property names, and the values are strings to search for. If no additional options are given, this will perform a LIKE "%â€¦%" search. Works only for string and text fields.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: If set to true return results that match any of the criteria given in the filter or search parameter instead of all of them. Default: false.
parameters.name: searchByAny

parameters.description: If set to true enables the use of "*" as a wildcard character in the search parameter. Default: false.
parameters.name: searchWildcardsEnabled

parameters.description: Sort the result by the given properties. Refer to a specific API get method description for a list of properties that can be used for sorting. Macros are not expanded before sorting. If no value is specified, data will be returned unsorted.
parameters.name: sortfield

parameters.description: Order of sorting. If an array is passed, each value will be matched to the corresponding property given in the sortfield parameter.
parameters.name: sortorder

parameters.description: The search parameter will compare the beginning of fields, that is, perform a LIKE "â€¦%" search instead. Ignored if searchWildcardsEnabled is set to true.
parameters.name: startSearch
